Response Time

Same-day confirmations

We reply within 24 hours with availability, prep instructions, and a link to pay your deposit. Urgent needs? Text us at (541) 501-0698.

Service Area

  • - Saint Helens & Columbia City core
  • - Scappoose, Rainier, and Vernonia
  • - Portland north & Longview by request

Preparation

Remove personal belongings, provide a driveway or covered space, and ensure access to the vehicle. We bring filtered water and power.

Packages

Choose a service from the Quantum flyer

Transparent starting prices and estimated time on site help you plan around work, school, or weekend drives.

Interior & Exterior Detail

$250

Time: 4 – 4.5 hrs

Complete inside/out mobile service including wash, clay, interior wipe-down, and glass.

Exterior Detail Only

$130

Time: 1.5 – 2 hrs

Great between storms—foam bath, paint decontamination, wheels, and sealant.

Interior Detail Only

$160

Time: 2 – 2.5 hrs

Steam sanitation, hot water extraction, leather treatment, and streak-free glass.

Paint Enhancement

$350

Time: 4.5 – 5 hrs

Single-stage polish brightens dull paint before applying a protective sealant.

Paint Correction (1-Step)

$550

Time: 6 – 6.5 hrs

Removes moderate swirls and oxidation in one pass—perfect for daily drivers.

Paint Correction (2-Step)

$750

Time: 7.5 – 8.5 hrs

Compound + finish for deeper defects before ceramic coating add-ons.

Ceramic Coating

+$1150

Time: 7 – 7.5 hrs

Long-term coating applied after correction for easier maintenance and gloss.
